mapper.select: select id,father_category_id as fathercategoryid,category_name categoryname,allow_comment as allowcomment,display_order as displayorder, url,deleted,show_nav as shownav,description,allow_publish as allowpublish,show_type as showtype,create_time as createtime,modify_time as modifytime from cms_category where id=#{id} limit 1

select id, father_category_id as fathercategoryid, category_name as categoryname, display_order as displayorder, url, deleted, show_nav as shownav, show_type as showtype from cms_category where deleted = 0 and show_nav = 1 and id>0 order by display_order asc
select id,category_name from cms_category where allow_publish=1 and deleted=0 and id>0
select count(id) from cms_category where father_category_id=#{id} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into cms_category ( father_category_id, category_name, allow_comment, display_order, url, deleted, show_nav, description, keyword, allow_publish, show_type, create_time, modify_time) values (#{fatherCategoryId}, #{categoryName}, #{allowComment}, #{displayOrder}, #{url}, #{deleted}, #{showNav}, #{description}, #{keyWord}, #{allowPublish}, #{showType}, #{createTime}, #{modifyTime})
